entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
